alert.note: Alert for McLean (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL MCLEAN COUNTY THROUGH 945 PM CDT... At 915 PM CDT, a strong thunderstorm was located 5 miles northeast of Underwood, or 16 miles north of Washburn, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Turtle Lake around 930 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Mercer. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
